name: Fading Echoes
description:
GAME'S STORY

Frey and Kyslar, royal guards, participate in the defense of the sumptuous princely wedding, finding themselves at the center of a trap created by detractors.
Without ever losing hope, they decide to set out in search of the truth, to avoid a conflict that now seems inevitable, bringing together a group of society's outcasts, between pirates and prisoners, becoming entangled in a conflict that has been brewing beneath the surface for a long time, finding themselves having to become the heroes they never thought they would be.



START FROM SCRATCH AND BECOME A HERO WITH TACTICAL RPG COMBAT

Engage in tactical RPG combat, with every command changing the course of the battle. Clear your path with multiple different types of magic and unique weapon abilities for each character, and the challenges on your way.



UNLIMITED ADVENTURE

Have fun in a fantasy Island and explore everything the island has to offer.
Unforgettable moments wait for you at every step of your journey, with stories, quests, and activities to enjoy at your leisure.
